name: Hashiru
description: Hashiru is a beautiful infinite runner, set in Japan. There are three areas you can visit, six skins you can unlock, and a very peaceful enviorment. Made by Tyler Garman (me) with graphics from my sister Emily for the GMCJAM competition. I would love if you could try it out! Hashiru was made for the 19th Gmcjam, we hope you enjoy it!
